long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Return price history to carsales!

The desktop version of carsales now lacks price history for whatever reason.
Get it back and start lowballing once more with carsales price history.
Is it ugly? yes. But does it work? also yes.

This extension simply requests the pricing history information still present on the mobile API for whatever car you are looking at, and then adds it to a small informational panel you can toggle at the top of your screen, so that you can see all of the changes that have been made to a cars price.

Written in 30 minutes, so it cant be that hard. Carsales, do your job!

Thanks to tom43 for suggestion
